How many bounties are spawned before a key is rewarded
Can you restart a bounty chain? You lose progress in the current chain
How many levels either side of the min max should we load? Based on a single play session
The maximum distance between the player and the bounty before it starts
The minimum distance at which a bounty will be allowed to be place at
The maximum distance at which a bounty will be allowed to be place at
How many items it will search for a spawn point in the set distance before giving up
How often in seconds that the Bounty checks the state. Low values use up more cpu.
The height above the player that a bounty can spawn at.
The height below the player that a bounty can spawn at.
The radius around the bounty at which enemies will spawn outside
The radius around the bossroom marker at which enemies will spawn. Careful here as this doesn't check for walls.
The maximum height distance enemys are allowed to spawn. This will stop enemies spawning up cliffs
The number of items that you get per key
The target endgame level, at which deadric gear will be rewarded
Increases the level of the player in the calculations to give better rewards
The chance of getting a weapon. These weights interplay with each other.
The chance of getting a potion/food
The chance of getting a scroll
The chance of getting a Ingredient
The chance of getting a Book
The chance of getting a Misc Item
The lowest damage weapon (for player level 1) multipled by 100
The highest damage weapon (for player at max level) multipled by 100
The lowest gold value (for player level 1)
The highest gold value (for player at max level)
Whether to spawn Misc items in the reward pool. A lot of quest breaking stuff in here such as claws etc.
Whether to spawn clothing in the reward pool
Whether to spawn shields in the reward pool
Whether to spawn Daedric Artifacts in the reward pool
